title.narrative: Bihar State Highways Project (formerly Bihar State Roads Investment Program)

description.narrative: The proposed investment program will improve transport efficiency of the state road network, which will contribute to expansion of economic opportunities and poverty reduction. This will be realized by improving the state road network and enhancing State Government of Bihar's (GOB) capacity for road asset development and management.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Enhanced road transport efficiency and safety

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Project roads maintained with International Roughness Index

description.narrative: Enhanced road transport efficiency and safety

title.narrative: Travel time on project roads reduced (Speed increase from current average of 35 km/hour to 60 km/hour)

description.narrative: Enhanced road transport efficiency and safety

title.narrative: Access of the rural poor to social services, markets and other economic activities improved (number of daily trips increase)

description.narrative: Enhanced road transport efficiency and safety
Enhanced road transport efficiency and safety

title.narrative: Actual growth rates of traffic on project roads surpasses assumed growth rates

description.narrative: Enhanced road transport efficiency and safety
Enhanced road transport efficiency and safety

title.narrative: Vehicle operating costs on proejct roads reduced by 30% for two-axle trucks and by 35% for passenger buses

description.narrative: Enhanced road transport efficiency and safety
